requirement.en: During the turn you Tribute Summoned this card in Attack Position.

effect.en: Place 1 card from the field on the bottom of the owner's Deck. Then, if you placed a face-up monster whose original Attribute is DARK by this effect, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. This turn, you cannot activate the effect of "Caius the Shadow Monarch".

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Triumphant Return of the Monarchs
Structure Deck: Triumphant Return of the Monarchs
